galapagos.genetic.codification

Interface CodificationMethod

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryCodification, DoubleFloatingPoint, FixedPoint, FloatingPoint, GrayFixedPoint, SimpleFloatingPoint

    public interface CodificationMethod
    A codification method is a function that map an Object to another Object. Is widely use in Genetics for separate cleanly the phenotype and the genotype. Encode and decode methods are used like map and inverse map respectively.
    Author:
    Diego Montesinos

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object decode(java.lang.Object obj)
      Decode an object into another.
      java.lang.Object encode(java.lang.Object obj)
      Encode an object into another.
